page.title: 16 OUR NEW LIFE IN PEEBLES(2)
page.content: while my Dad looked for houses. During a visit to Peebles,we heard about new houses being built so we looked at them and in the end bought one.We moved in on 5th November 1983. I like Peebles a lot it reminds me of the more scenic areas of Northumberland.I especially like Hay Lodge Park which has lots of good facilities and woodland areas.The shops are good for my mum because it's not too far from our house.Peebles is a great place for going walks at night.You can see the sunset silhouetted against the trees.Here you can get clean fresh air instead of industrial fumes.I like Peebles a lot and don't want to move from it.
